Document:
# Command Clarifications 1. Head of Personnel is considered second in line of succession for station Captain, but has equal rank to every other head of staff.
2. Head of Personnel may hire/fire staff with the relevant department head's permission.
3. Head of Personnel may not give orders to, or assign workers from any department other than service.
4. Warden is considered second in command of security, however is not command staff.
5. Assistant command falls under the Head of Personnel, but are not considered service department.
